Platinum.notes: Market cap is approximated here as indicative market size, not an equity market cap.

Copper.notes: Size represents estimated annual market value, not a listed market cap.

Crude Oil.notes: Size derived from global consumption × price order-of-magnitude.

Wheat.notes: Size based on global production × average price order-of-magnitude.

Cocoa.notes: Indicative physical market size; adjust to your methodology.

Coffee.notes: Arabica futures proxy; values are order-of-magnitude.

Nickel.notes: If Yahoo ticker resolution fails in your region, swap to an ETF proxy or vendor feed.
